name: .bash.
description:
SAVING IS NOT AVAILABLE IN WEB VERSION. Also, the web version seems to not work smoothly for some people. For best experience, please try the desktop or Android version.

Reach the top of the tower as fast as you can!

Controls: Mouse click/ touch: drag and release anywhere on the screen to launch the ball in that direction.

Game by David Stephen

Music by Henrik Dreyer

All assets created in 3 days for ScoreSpace Jam #10

Made with LÖVE.
